verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תָבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> unto them When ye be come אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> into the land מוֹשְׁבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4186> of your habitations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> which I give לָכֶֽם׃

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <WH6213> And will make אִשֶּׁ֤ה <WH801> an offering by fire לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD עֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> a burnt offering אוֹ־ <WH176> or זֶ֔בַח <WH2077> or a sacrifice לְפַלֵּא־ <WH6381> in performing נֶ֙דֶר֙ <WH5088> a vow א֣וֹ <WH176> or בִנְדָבָ֔ה <WH5071> or in a freewill offering א֖וֹ <WH176> or בְּמֹעֲדֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4150> or in your solemn feasts לַעֲשׂ֞וֹת <WH6213> to make רֵ֤יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> of the herd א֥וֹ <WH176> or מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> or of the flock

וְהִקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> Then shall he that offereth הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> bring קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <WH7133> his offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> a meat offering סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> of flour עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <WH6241> of a tenth deal בָּל֕וּל <WH1101> mingled בִּרְבִעִ֥ית <WH7243> with the fourth הַהִ֖ין <WH1969> [part] of an hin שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> of oil

וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> of wine לַנֶּ֙סֶךְ֙ <WH5262> for a drink offering רְבִיעִ֣ית <WH7243> And the fourth הַהִ֔ין <WH1969> [part] of an hin תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou prepare עַל־ <WH5921> with הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> with the burnt offering א֣וֹ <WH176> or לַזָּ֑בַח <WH2077> or sacrifice לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> for one

א֤וֹ <WH176> Or לָאַ֙יִל֙ <WH352> Or for a ram תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> thou shalt prepare מִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> [for] a meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> of flour שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֑ים <WH6241> tenth deals בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil שְׁלִשִׁ֥ית <WH7992> with the third הַהִֽין׃ <WH1969> [part] of an hin

וְיַ֥יִן <WH3196> of wine לַנֶּ֖סֶךְ <WH5262> And for a drink offering שְׁלִשִׁ֣ית <WH7992> the third הַהִ֑ין <WH1969> [part] of an hin תַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> thou shalt offer רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> [for] a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> When תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> And when thou preparest בֶן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> bull עֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> [for] a burnt offering אוֹ־ <WH176> or זָ֑בַח <WH2077> or [for] a sacrifice לְפַלֵּא־ <WH6381> in performing נֶ֥דֶר <WH5088> a vow אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> or peace offerings לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהִקְרִ֤יב <WH7126> Then shall he bring עַל־ <WH5921> and בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> bull מִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> a meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> of flour שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> of three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֑ים <WH6241> tenth deals בָּל֥וּל <WH1101> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> with half הַהִֽין׃ <WH1969> an hin

וְיַ֛יִן <WH3196> of wine תַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> And thou shalt bring לַנֶּ֖סֶךְ <WH5262> for a drink offering חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> half הַהִ֑ין <WH1969> an hin אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> [for] an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֗ה <WH6213> Thus shall it be done לַשּׁוֹר֙ <WH7794> bullock הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> for one א֖וֹ <WH176> or לָאַ֣יִל <WH352> ram הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> or for one אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or לַשֶּׂ֥ה <WH7716> lambs בַכְּבָשִׂ֖ים <WH3532> of the male א֥וֹ <WH176> or בָעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> or a kid

כַּמִּסְפָּ֖ר <WH4557> According to the number אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> that ye shall prepare כָּ֛כָה <WH3602> so תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> shall ye do לָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> to every one כְּמִסְפָּרָֽם׃ <WH4557> according to their number

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הָאֶזְרָ֥ח <WH249> All that are born of the country יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> shall do כָּ֖כָה <WH3602> this אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these לְהַקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> these things after this manner in offering אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יָגוּר֩ <WH1481> sojourn אִתְּכֶ֨ם <WH854> for גֵּ֜ר <WH1616> And if a stranger א֤וֹ <WH176> or אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> who בְּתֽוֹכְכֶם֙ <WH8432> with you or whosoever [be] among לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> you in your generations וְעָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> and will offer אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> as ye do כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> so he shall do

הַקָּהָ֕ל <WH6951> [shall be both] for you of the congregation חֻקָּ֥ה <WH2708> ordinance אַחַ֛ת <WH259> One לָכֶ֖ם וְלַגֵּ֣ר <WH1616> and also for the stranger הַגָּ֑ר <WH1481> that sojourneth חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> [with you] an ordinance עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> in your generations כָּכֶ֛ם כַּגֵּ֥ר <WH1616> as ye [are] so shall the stranger יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> be before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

תּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> law אַחַ֛ת <WH259> One וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> manner אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and one יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֑ם וְלַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> shall be for you and for the stranger הַגָּ֥ר <WH1481> that sojourneth אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> for פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to בְּבֹֽאֲכֶם֙ <WH935> unto them When ye come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it

וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> become בַּאֲכָלְכֶ֖ם <WH398> Then it shall be that when ye eat מִלֶּ֣חֶם <WH3899> of the bread הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land תָּרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> ye shall offer up תְרוּמָ֖ה <WH8641> an heave offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

רֵאשִׁית֙ <WH7225> of the first עֲרִסֹ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <WH6182> of your dough חַלָּ֖ה <WH2471> a cake תָּרִ֣ימוּ <WH7311> Ye shall offer up תְרוּמָ֑ה <WH8641> [for] an heave offering כִּתְרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> as [ye do] the heave offering גֹּ֔רֶן <WH1637> of the threshingfloor כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so תָּרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> so shall ye heave אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853>

מֵרֵאשִׁית֙ <WH7225> Of the first עֲרִסֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6182> of your dough תִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> ye shall give לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD תְּרוּמָ֑ה <WH8641> an heave offering לְדֹרֹ֖תֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> in your generations ס

וְכִ֣י <WH3588> when תִשְׁגּ֔וּ <WH7686> And if ye have erred וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and not observed אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> all these commandments הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> unto Moses

אֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [Even] all that the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> about בְּיַד־ <WH3027> you by the hand מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיּ֞וֹם <WH3117> from the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD וָהָ֖לְאָה <WH1973> [Moses] and henceforward לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> among your generations

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become אִ֣ם <WH518> shall be if מֵעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> without the knowledge הָעֵדָה֮ <WH5712> of the congregation נֶעֶשְׂתָ֣ה <WH6213> Then it shall be if [ought] be committed לִשְׁגָגָה֒ <WH7684> by ignorance וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> shall offer כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָ֡ה <WH5712> that all the congregation פַּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָר֩ <WH1241> bull אֶחָ֨ד <WH259> one לְעֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering לְרֵ֤יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> for a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּמִנְחָת֥וֹ <WH4503> with his meat offering וְנִסְכּ֖וֹ <WH5262> and his drink offering כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> according to the manner וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and one לְחַטָּֽת׃ <WH2403> for a sin offering

וְכִפֶּ֣ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> And the priest עַֽל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> for all עֲדַ֛ת <WH5712> for all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְנִסְלַ֣ח <WH5545> and it shall be forgiven לָהֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> it was שְׁגָגָ֣ה <WH7684> them for it [is] ignorance הִ֔וא <WH1931> he וְהֵם֩ <WH1992> and they הֵבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> and they shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנָ֜ם <WH7133> their offering אִשֶּׁ֣ה <WH801> a sacrifice made by fire לַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְחַטָּאתָ֛ם <WH2403> and their sin offering לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> for שִׁגְגָתָֽם׃ <WH7684> for their ignorance

וְנִסְלַ֗ח <WH5545> And it shall be forgiven לְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַת֙ <WH5712> all the congregation בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> and the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <WH1481> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> among כִּ֥י <WH3588> to לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> them seeing all the people בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <WH7684> [were] in ignorance ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> if נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul אַחַ֖ת <WH259> And if any תֶּחֱטָ֣א <WH2398> sin בִשְׁגָגָ֑ה <WH7684> through ignorance וְהִקְרִ֛יבָה <WH7126> then he shall bring עֵ֥ז <WH5795> a she goat בַּת־ <WH1323> of the first שְׁנָתָ֖הּ <WH8141> year לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> for a sin offering

וְכִפֶּ֣ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> And the priest עַל־ <WH5921> for הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> for the soul הַשֹּׁגֶ֛גֶת <WH7684> by ignorance בְּחֶטְאָ֥ה <WH2398> when he sinneth בִשְׁגָגָ֖ה <WH7683> that sinneth ignorantly לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and וְנִסְלַ֥ח <WH5545> for him and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃

הָֽאֶזְרָח֙ <WH249> [both for] him that is born בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> and for the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <WH1481> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> among תּוֹרָ֤ה <WH8451> law אַחַת֙ <WH259> Ye shall have one יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֔ם לָעֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> for him that sinneth בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <WH7684> through ignorance

וְהַנֶּ֜פֶשׁ <WH5315> But the soul אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> who תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה ׀ <WH6213> that doeth בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> able רָמָ֗ה <WH7411> beguile מִן־ <WH4480> whether הָֽאֶזְרָח֙ <WH249> [whether he be] born in the land וּמִן־ <WH4480> whether הַגֵּ֔ר <WH1616> an alien אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD ה֣וּא <WH1931> one מְגַדֵּ֑ף <WH1442> the same reproacheth וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> and that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> one מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5971> his people

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בָּזָ֔ה <WH959> Because he hath despised וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוָת֖וֹ <WH4687> his commandment הֵפַ֑ר <WH6565> and hath broken הִכָּרֵ֧ת ׀ <WH3772> shall utterly תִּכָּרֵ֛ת <WH3772> be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he עֲוֹנָ֥ה <WH5771> his iniquity בָֽהּ׃ פ

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And while the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> were in the wilderness וַֽיִּמְצְא֗וּ <WH4672> they found אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> a man מְקֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH7197> that gathered עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> sticks בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> upon the sabbath
